name: GRIT Portfolio
author: Rityunjay

sections.description:
This plugin can be used as portfolio gallery, slider, masonry, carousel etc using given setting. Use shortcode in your page or posts or templates to display a beautiful gallery.
There is options to show images in desired columns upto 4.

Donations

If you liked this plugin, Please donate.
sections.installation: Install using either ftp or using dashboard/plugins/add new options in wordpress dashboard. After upload, go to settings, chose an option to display your gallery. Then from left side of dashboard, click on Grit Portfolio menu and add images.If you want tabbed gallery then create few categories. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
How to use this?
Simply install and use given shortcode in your post , pages or templates.

Is it free ?
Yes, it is completely free.

Do you provide support?
We provide free support, but it will take time to respond.
sections.changelog: No changelog since it is first version
